name: Dreamise
tag_list: crowdfunding, crowdsourcing, dreams, wishes, challenge, competition, game
overview: Dreamise is crowdfunding platform, based on people’s dreams. It’s like Kickstarter for dreams. Every person can realize his material dreams by sharing it with the whole world and doing different tasks. He pays $5/month and create his own dreams(up to 3). Every month top rated dreams are sponsored by the company. It’s necessary to notice that winners receives their wishes that they placed on Dreamise. We don’t give a money. We makes your dreams come true! Idea is that more people participate, more people get their wishes. Dreamise just take the commission from every user and a part of Dreamise’s revenue going to charity program. Person’s dreams have their own ratings, which include votes & comments for them and profile activity rating. Last one depends on his activity, means that more a person vote&comment for smb else dreams, more rating points he get to his dreams. Adding a person can perform different tasks and quests to raise up his rating. So, it becomes a some kind of a game where people gain real things for himself or somebody.
